channel.title: How can I change the login background of Moparscape?
channel.description:
Hello,
[center]How can I change the login background of Moparscape???
[img]http://www.madpaintballer.com/paintball-pictures/Screenshot3.png[/img]
I hope you can help me.[/center]
Thanks, Adroutine

item.title: How can I change the login background of Moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @m0nk3y_pks m0nk3y pks
item.description:
@m0nk3y_pks wrote:

because im retarted and i dont even know how to use winzip… lol[br][size=1]Posted on: July 05, 2007, 11:14:45 PM[/size][hr]ok i didnt know you could delete it all at once so i started doing 1 at a time… lol then i found out you could select them so i did and it wouldnt let me is said that some were being used by another program or person so yeah… now i have have missing files i should have and whenever i redownload the mopar client it dosent restore the files please help meeeeee i cant play mopar anymore =’[

item.title: How can I change the login background of Moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @quest_rs quest rs
item.description:
@quest_rs wrote:

delete the whole filestore32 file and reload mopar again ;p it’ll redownload the file for you lol.

or just make your pic called mopar (jpeg)

item.title: How can I change the login background of Moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @quest_rs quest rs
item.description:
@quest_rs wrote:

go to this file

C:\WINDOWS.mpr_file_store_32

and file the jpg called mopar … you change that :P. Simple :D!

Read full topic
